DOC.detailed_description: The purpose feasibility study evaluate MDLAP ( MD-Logic artificial pancreas system ) automate insulin management system use continuous glucose monitoring ( CGM ) subcutaneous insulin pump infusion individual type 1 diabetes . The study include 3 inpatient admission ( 12-24 hr ) , include overnight sleep , over-bolus meal , under-bolus meal exercise . During visit , meal bolus semi-automated , manual meal announcement physician/nurse , automate bolus recommendation system , automate delivery bolus follow confirmation recommendation . Between-meal insulin dose fully automate . Bolus confirmation physician/nurse request close loop controller determines carbohydrate may necessary avoid hypoglycemia follow bolus .
